price: Ɛda a wͻbɛhyia no no, wͻn nkyea (a abͻfoͻ no de bεkyea wͻn) ne ‘Salaam’: Asomdwoeε; Wasiesie animuonyam akatua nso ama wͻn.
arabic: تَحِيَّتُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ سَلَٰمٞۚ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا كَرِيمٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: taḥiyyatuhum yawma yalqawnahu salāmun wa-aʿadda lahum ajran karīman
